tidbits.title: Rich History
tidbits.description: Ghana has a rich historical legacy, known for its ancient empires like the Ashanti and for being the first African country to gain independence from colonial rule.

tidbits.title: Vibrant Culture
tidbits.description: The country is celebrated for its vibrant culture, showcased through colorful festivals, traditional Kente cloth, lively music, and captivating dance forms.

tidbits.title: Friendly People
tidbits.description: Ghanaians are known for their warmth and hospitality, offering visitors a friendly and welcoming atmosphere that embodies the country's 'Akwaaba' spirit.
